t: r/Shoes on Reddit: Over 15 years ago, during a vacation to Treasure Island FL, I bought these pair of sandals, brand name PALI Hawaii. t: Amazon.com: Pali Hawaii Women's Classic Sandals : Tools & Home Improvement
s: Again, that may be my crotchety self speaking. IMO, Pali's are the equivalent to the plastic sandals you would find in Walmart for $5 - but for a lot more money. In fact, I bought a pair of sandals in Walmart Hawaii for $5 which were more comfortable than these, but someone stole them.
